titleStmt.title: Here foloweth thre practyses, nowe vsed at Mountpyller, by mon syre Emery. a romayne borne in Rome, a doctoure in astronomye [et] phesyke and other doth practyse the same, fyrste an oyle, or onement, and a powder, and the. iii. a water, for many infyrmytes and deseases for the health of the body.
titleStmt.author: Emery, John, doctoure in astronomye et phesyke.

titleStmt.title: Here foloweth thre practyses, nowe vsed at Mountpyller, by mon syre Emery. a romayne borne in Rome, a doctoure in astronomye [et] phesyke and other doth practyse the same, fyrste an oyle, or onement, and a powder, and the. iii. a water, for many infyrmytes and deseases for the health of the body.
titleStmt.author: Emery, John, doctoure in astronomye et phesyke.

publicationStmt.publisher: Newly imprynted by me Robert wyer,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 7678+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
